settings.title: System Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure themes, languages, analytics, and privacy
settings.allowThemeSwitchingDesc: Let users toggle between light and dark mode
settings.inheritHostThemeDesc: Widget automatically matches host site's theme
settings.atLeastOne: At least one language must be enabled
settings.translateAIDesc: AI will respond in selected language
settings.enableWorldMapDesc: Show visitors on interactive world map
settings.realTimeUpdatesDesc: Analytics refresh automatically with live data
settings.exportFormatsDesc: CSV, Excel (.xlsx), and PDF exports enabled
settings.privacyNoticeDesc: We recommend enabling IP anonymization and disabling IP storage for GDPR compliance. Only country-level data will be tracked.
